content: That sounds like a great idea. I'll definitely try to use Instagram Live to share behind-the-scenes content and sneak peeks. Since I've been getting a lot of engagement on my recent posts, I think it's a good opportunity to take it to the next level. By the way, I've been noticing that I've been spending a lot of time on messaging apps, especially WhatsApp, and I'm trying to reduce my usage. Do you think using website blockers or app blockers could help me stay focused and reduce my screen time?
